abstract.para: SUSEÂ® Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications is optimized in various ways for SAP* applications. This guide provides detailed information about installing and customizing SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications for SAP HANA system replication in the performance optimized scenario. The document focuses on the steps to integrate an already installed and working SAP HANA with system replication. It is based on SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP6. The concept however can be used with SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 15 SP4 or newer.
